Key Match Events: Benches cleared after Maikel Garcia's slide into second base during a double play; Jazz Chisholm Jr. exchanged words with Garcia, accusing him of trying to injure Anthony Volpe; Gerrit Cole approached Garcia but was intercepted by Austin Wells; no ejections occurred during the incident
Pre-Game Insights: Jazz Chisholm Jr. criticized the Royals' Game 2 win, implying they were lucky and that the Yankees would still win the series; Chisholm's comments set the stage for the benches-clearing incident
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone, the Yankees' manager, downplayed the incident, comparing it to the old Yankees-Royals rivalry but noting that no one was ejected; Boone joked about the altercation not matching past Yankees-Royals games
